name: Kickshock
description:
Created in under 48 hours for Game Maker's Toolkit Jam in July 2017.

Theme: Dual Purpose Design

Kickshock is a game about shocking things and kicking even more things. Enjoy, please do leave suggestions and feedback.

Use the mouse to fire and A/D to move left/right.

Hint: Having trouble with staying alive? Stringing combos together for some drops...
